description: Single storey rear extension; replacement of windows to first and second floor rear elevation
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and documents: EX00 (Site & Location Plans), EX01 (Existing: Ground Floor Plan), EX02 (Existing: First Floor Plan), EX03 (Existing: Loft Floor Plan), EX04 (Existing: Roof Floor Plan), EX05 (Existing: Section A-A), EX06 (Existing: Rear Elevation), ME01 (M&E: Ground Floor Plan), P01 (Proposed: Ground Floor Plan), P02 (Proposed: First Floor Plan), P03 (Proposed: Loft Floor Plan), P04 (Proposed: Roof Floor Plan), P05 (Proposed: Section A-A) and P06 (Proposed: Rear Elevation).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or in the approved drawings and documents listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).	 | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
